titleStmt.title: A peculiar prognostication astrologically predicted according to art: VVhether, or no, His Majestie shall suffer death this present yeere 1649. / The possibility thereof discussed and divulged, by William Lilly, student in astrologie.
titleStmt.author: Lilly, William, 1602-1681.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication supplied by Wing.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 6 1648". The 9 in 1649 has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
